Title: lower
Description: Extracts the lower bound of the multirange (NULL if the multirange is empty has no lower bound).
Category: Range divide Multirange Functions and Operators

Title: upper
Description: Extracts the upper bound of the multirange (NULL if the multirange is empty or has no upper bound).
Category: Range divide Multirange Functions and Operators

Title: isempty
Category: Range divide Multirange Functions and Operators

Title: lower_inc
Description: Is the multirange's lower bound inclusive?
Category: Range divide Multirange Functions and Operators

Title: upper_inc
Description: Is the multirange's upper bound inclusive?
Category: Range divide Multirange Functions and Operators

Title: lower_inf
Description: Does the multirange have no lower bound? (A lower bound of -Infinity returns false.)
Category: Range divide Multirange Functions and Operators

Title: upper_inf
Description: Does the multirange have no upper bound? (An upper bound of Infinity returns false.)
Category: Range divide Multirange Functions and Operators

Title: range_merge
Description: Computes the smallest range that includes the entire multirange.
Category: Range divide Multirange Functions and Operators

Title: multirange
Description: Returns a multirange containing just the given range.
Category: Range divide Multirange Functions and Operators

Title: unnest
Description: Expands a multirange into a set of ranges. The ranges are read out in storage order (ascending).
Category: Range divide Multirange Functions and Operators
